about.name: Moumita Ahamed
about.description: I am an experienced PHP developer with over 3 years of expertise in web application development, database optimization, and API integration. My journey in tech has expanded to include React.js and advanced JavaScript, allowing me to build scalable and interactive front-end experiences.

services.title: Advanced JavaScript Development
services.description: Building high-performance and scalable web applications using modern JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, and best practices.

services.title: React.js Development
services.description: Creating dynamic, responsive, and fast single-page applications (SPAs) with React.js, Next.js, and state management libraries like Redux and Zustand.

services.title: PHP & Backend Development
services.description: Developing secure and scalable server-side applications using PHP, Laravel, CodeIgniter, and RESTful API integration.

services.title: API Development & Integration
services.description: Building and integrating RESTful & GraphQL APIs for seamless communication between front-end and back-end applications.
